abstract: In a deteriorating advertising climate, the company said it would seek to eliminate jobs through attrition and buyouts.
snippet: In a deteriorating advertising climate, the company said it would seek to eliminate jobs through attrition and buyouts.
lead_paragraph: 12:20 p.m. | Updated In the midst of a deteriorating advertising climate, The New York Times plans to eliminate up to 20 newsroom positions and seek additional savings in the business units, the company said Thursday.

headline.main: New York Times Plans Staff Reductions
